Yes gestational diabetes is terrible, & if not handled properly, you could still have it after the pregnancy. It puts you & the baby up for many risks that could lead to problems possibly for life. It also causes the baby to be pretty big which would result in you having a c-section. But it's something your ob monitors every month during your checkup so if they haven't brought it up, you should be fine.
